basics.name: Dorian Gailhard
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: PhD student at Télécom Paris, aiming at developing a deep-learning model able to generate electronic chip designs.

work.name: Télécom Paris
work.summary: Advised by Jhony Giraldo, Enzo Tartaglione, and Lirida Naviner, in collaboration with Arteris. Aiming at developing a deep-learning model able to generate electronic chip designs.
highlights: Topic: System on Chips Design leveraging Artificial Intelligence

work.name: Università degli Studi di Padova
work.summary: Supervised by Francesco Rinaldi. Worked on continuous formulations for variants of the Maximum Clique Problem in hypergraphs, with Python and C++ implementations.
highlights: Topics: Clustering, Graph Theory, Optimization, Tensor Theory, Python, C++ , Operations Research

education.summary: Deep practical and theoretical understanding of Artificial Intelligence topics, focusing on the research side of AI (maths, theory, experimentation, frontier research...).
Introduction to data science topics, focusing on the practical and engineering aspect (cloud infrastructures, database management, web development...).
Broad curriculum introducing the main topics of computer science (programming languages, network infrastructures, digital economy, ...).
Two years intensive program preparing for the French national competitive exams for Grandes Écoles, equivalent to a Bachelor in Maths and Physics.
